info.name: Outlook Mail - Dark Minimal
info.description:
A small set of changes designed to accompany the built in dark theme. Should help improve garish color pallete and remove advertising spaces. 

Also have removed favourite section from side menu for minimising clutter (personally dont use). To re-enable remove the three classes under 
/* Favorites*/ note.

Each of the other features added in updates have been clearly maked in the css and can be removed based on user prefrerence.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.1.0- Update to Remove Command Text and add tooltips,
v1.1.1- Update to Clean Up Mail List Items,
v1.1.2- Tweaked Mail List Items and added Linked Account Button on hover.
